title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Child Protective Forms (Family Court Act Article 10), form 10-11a - Motion to terminate placement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Child Protective Forms (Family Court Act Article 10), form 10-11a - Motion to terminate placement

State Regulations
F.C.A.ยง 1062 Form 10-11a
(Child Protective-Motion

To Terminate Placement)
(9/2006)
FAMILY COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF
________
In the Matter of Docket No. CIN #
A Child under Eighteen Years of

Age alleged to be

Abused Neglected by MOTION TO
TERMINATE PLACEMENT
Respondent(s)
________
TO: PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that upon the annexed
affidavit of [specify]: sworn to on the day of and upon all the proceedings
heretofore had herein, a motion will be made at this Court at [specify
address]: on [specify date]:, or as soon thereafter as the parties and counsel
can be heard for an Order terminating the placement of the following child
[specify]: with [specify]: and for such other and further relief as to the

Court may seem just and proper. Dated: Yours, etc. Movant: Parent Attorney Other [specify
relationship to child]: ________
________
________
Print or type name
______________
Address and Telephone No. ______________
Signature of Attorney, if any
______________
Print or Type Name
________
______________
Address and Telephone No. of Attorney, if
any

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Child Protective

Forms (Family Court Act Article 10), form
10-11a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
